Uses of Class
org.hibernate.type.AbstractType

Packages that use AbstractType
Package
Description
org.hibernate.persister.entity
This package abstracts persistence mechanisms for entities.
org.hibernate.type
A Hibernate Type is a strategy for mapping a Java property type to a JDBC type or types.

  • Uses of AbstractType in org.hibernate.persister.entity

    Description
    class 
    DiscriminatorType<T>
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    The functionality of DiscriminatorType, DiscriminatorMetadata and MetaType have been consolidated into EntityDiscriminatorMapping and DiscriminatorConverter
